net.floodlightcontroller.core.test

类 PacketFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.floodlightcontroller.core.test.PacketFactory

  • public class PacketFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to that creates many types of L2/L3/L4 or OpenFlow packets. This is used in testing.
    作者:
    alexreimers

        Generates a DHCP request OFPacketIn.
